title: (PICTURES) Sri Lankans overseas protest against country’s crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankans living across the world have stepped out onto the streets to show their support to their brethren here at home, who are suffering from the economic crisis.
Protests were organized in Australia, the UK, the USA, and several other countries.
Country cannot be rebuilt as long as one family stays in power: Dr. Wijedasa Rajapaksha
